usefulItems: large saucepan, colander, oven-proof dish, grill
title: Quick Tomato and Basil Gnocchi

ingredients.content: 2 slices wholemeal bread, cut in pieces (approx. 90 g)

preparations.content: Place a bowl on mixing bowl lid and weigh in mozzarella, then set aside. Place bread, garlic and parsley in mixing bowl then grate <b>6 sec/speed 8<b>. Transfer to bowl with mozzarella, stir with spatula to combine, then set aside.
Place garlic, shallots and oil in mixing bowl, chop <b>4 sec/speed 5<b> then sauté <b>2 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add passata, balsamic vinegar, basil, chilli flakes, sugar, salt and pepper then cook <b>10 min/100°C//speed 2<b>. Add spinach and stir with spatula until wilted.
Bring a large saucepan of water with 1 tsp salt added to the boil. Cook gnocchi for 2 minutes less than the pack instructions, drain using a colander and transfer to a large oven-proof dish.
Preheat grill to medium heat. Cover gnocchi with reserved tomato sauce, fold in mozzarella and finish with breadcrumb topping.
Place gnocchi under grill for 3-5 minutes, until cheese is bubbling and golden. Serve immediately.
